name: v2.0.0
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: Apply "version" tag only when the span service name matches the default service name by @zacharycmontoya in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/157
* feat!: Change default value of DD_TRACE_RATE_LIMIT to 100 by @zacharycmontoya in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/159
* feat!: Set a default service name (DD_SERVICE) when no service is configured by @zacharycmontoya in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/158
* refactor!: expose telemetry module by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/166
* fix: telemetry support for sub-seconds intervals by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/168
* Properly support setting DD_TRACE_TRANSPORT to "none" by @kristjanvalur in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/172
* fix: Remote config service/env validation by @zacharycmontoya in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/177
* perf: parse w3c traceparent using a custom parser by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/178
* fix(telemetry): Handle empty configuration payload properly by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/186
* feat: store tracer configuration in an in-memory file by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/184
* feat: add telemetry logs by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/185
* feat!: default to null logger by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/187
* feat: add baggage API by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/179
* fix(sampling): update condition by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/198
* deps(nlohmann-json): upgrade to 3.12.0 by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/210
* perf: improve mutex contention by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/208
* feat(telemetry): track tracer and telemetry usage by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/209
* feat: support origin detection by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/214
* feat: support additional cgroup formats for container-id parsing by @zacharycmontoya in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/222
* feat: support disablement of APM Tracing (the product) by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/224
* fix(system-tests): set end time when a span is closed by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/228
* deps(nlohmann-json): `FetchContent` rely on `find_package` by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/231
* fix: edge cases parsing of `DD_TAGS` by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/233
* fix(rc): improve trace sampling rules parsing by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/232
* fix(rc): rework remote configuration handling by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/234
* fix(rc): handle null values in RC APM Tracing payloads by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/236
* feat(telemetry): report malformed baggage header  by @rachelyangdog in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/240
* Replace Abseil extension with bazel_dep and eliminate source patching by @mmorel-35 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/243
* chore(cmake): overall improvements by @dmehala in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/242

## New Contributors
* @kristjanvalur made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/172
* @tlhunter made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/175
* @mabdinur made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/170
* @xopham made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/180
* @dependabot[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/182
* @ddyurchenko made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/225
* @rachelyangdog made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/pull/240

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-cpp/compare/v1.0.0...v2.0.0
